name: Federação Nacional da Educação
goal: Representation of all education workers (teachers and non-teachers) of public, private, cooperative and social sectors, of all educational levels, and affiliated partners in the ten unions of FNE, seven trade unions of teachers and three unions of education support employees, covering Continental Portugal, Madeira, Azores and Portuguese Communities Abroad. The activity of FNE covers the social dialogue and collective bargaining, as well as protecting the interests and aspirations of education workers.
interests: Budget, Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Migration and asylum, Research and innovation, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives:
- European Alliance for Apprenticeships (EAfA)
- Culture, education and youth (more: education and training)
- Employment and social affairs
- Science and technology (mainly Research)
- Legislation: regulations, directives and decisions
